frontmatter.title: How do you paint so smoothly with the brush tool?

markdownRemark.html:
A smooth gradient can be achieved layering washes of watercolor on top of each other. Speed and pressure play an important role in how clean of a tone you end up with. My Paper Basics guide explains athe nuances of the watercolor brush and techniques for using it.
